## Working with a Survey

**Setup Pre-requisites:**

  * <a href="Block7_EXT-RRStudio.html">Download R and RStudio</a> 
  

In this 3-part course, we'll cover the fundamental steps of working with survey data, focusing on transparent and reproducible workflows.  The first section will be an interactive introduction to R and RStudio, including an introduction to the environment, basic syntax and foundational concepts, and creating our first reproducible R script.

### Overarching Learning Objectives

By the end of this course, you will be able to:




### Section Overviews

#### Section 1: Introduction to R

* Introduce R and RStudio
* Setting up files in R
  * File types in R
  * Creating a project
  * Setting a working directory
* Create our first R script
* Creating objects in R
* Applying literate coding principles to make our code interpretable and reproducible
